radiographic_examinations.findings: Initially interpreted as having no evidence of pulmonary infiltrates, widened mediastinum, or pleural effusion. However, suggested possible interval enlargement of the left hilum and a possible small left pleural effusion when compared with films obtained 3 years previously.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: On November 18, showed clear evidence of a left pleural effusion. On November 19, showed progression of the left pleural effusion. By November 21, revealed progressive consolidation and a new right pleural effusion.
